name: base-component-js
description: Customizable component scaffolding made in vanilla Javascript.
author: Khafizi Noh

scripts.install: cd ./base-component-js && npm i && cd ../example &&npm i && cd ..
scripts.build: cd ./base-component-js && npm run build && cd ../example && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:dev: cd ./base-component-js && npm run build:dev && cd ../example && npm run build:dev && cd ..
scripts.build:prod: cd ./base-component-js && npm run build:prod && cd ../example && npm run build:prod && cd ..
scripts.watch: cd ./base-component-js && npm run watch && cd ../example && npm run watch && cd ..
scripts.watch:dev: cd ./base-component-js && npm run watch:dev && cd ../example && npm run watch:dev && cd ..
scripts.watch:prod: cd ./base-component-js && npm run watch:prod && cd ../example && npm run watch:prod && cd ..
